name: py-sacrebleu

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
SacreBLEU is a standard BLEU implementation that downloads and manages
WMT datasets, produces scores on detokenized outputs, and reports a
string encapsulating BLEU parameters, facilitating the production of
shareable, comparable BLEU scores.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-portalocker
dependencies.description: Portalocker is a library to provide an easy API to file locking.

dependencies.name: py-regex
dependencies.description: Alternative regular expression module, to replace re.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
